hibernate-mapping.query:
from com.ibm.tap.misld.om.cndb.Customer c
join fetch c.customerType join fetch c.pod join fetch c.industry join fetch c.industry.sector join fetch c.contactDPE left join fetch c.misldRegistration left join fetch c.misldAccountSettings left join fetch c.misldAccountSettings.qualifiedDiscount left join fetch c.misldAccountSettings.licenseAgreementType
where c.pod = :pod
order by c.customerName

from com.ibm.tap.misld.om.cndb.Customer c
join fetch c.customerType join fetch c.pod join fetch c.countryCode join fetch c.industry join fetch c.industry.sector join fetch c.contactDPE join fetch c.misldRegistration join fetch c.misldAccountSettings join fetch c.misldAccountSettings.licenseAgreementType left join fetch c.misldAccountSettings.qualifiedDiscount left join fetch c.misldAccountSettings.defaultLpid
where c.pod = :pod and c.misldRegistration.inScope = 1 and (c.misldAccountSettings.status = 'COMPLETE' or c.misldAccountSettings.status = 'LOCKED')
order by c.customerName

from com.ibm.tap.misld.om.cndb.Customer c
join fetch c.pod join fetch c.contactDPE join fetch c.misldAccountSettings
where c.misldAccountSettings.priceReportStatus = 'APPROVED'
order by c.pod.podName, c.customerName

from com.ibm.tap.misld.om.cndb.Customer c
join fetch c.pod join fetch c.contactDPE join fetch c.misldAccountSettings
where c.pod = :pod and c.misldAccountSettings.priceReportStatus = 'APPROVED'
order by c.customerName

from com.ibm.tap.misld.om.cndb.Customer c
join fetch c.customerType join fetch c.pod join fetch c.industry join fetch c.industry.sector join fetch c.contactDPE join fetch c.misldRegistration join fetch c.misldAccountSettings join fetch c.misldAccountSettings.licenseAgreementType left join fetch c.misldAccountSettings.qualifiedDiscount left join fetch c.misldAccountSettings.defaultLpid
where c.misldRegistration.inScope = 1 and c.misldAccountSettings.status = 'COMPLETE' and (c.misldAccountSettings.defaultLpid is not null)

from com.ibm.tap.misld.om.cndb.Customer c
join fetch c.misldRegistration join fetch c.misldAccountSettings
where c.misldRegistration.inScope = 1 and c.misldAccountSettings.status = 'LOCKED'

from com.ibm.tap.misld.om.cndb.Customer c
join fetch c.customerType join fetch c.pod join fetch c.industry join fetch c.industry.sector join fetch c.contactDPE join fetch c.countryCode left join fetch c.misldRegistration left join fetch c.misldAccountSettings left join fetch c.misldAccountSettings.qualifiedDiscount left join fetch c.misldAccountSettings.licenseAgreementType left join fetch c.misldAccountSettings.defaultLpid
where c.customerId = :customerId

from com.ibm.tap.misld.om.cndb.Customer c
join fetch c.customerType join fetch c.pod join fetch c.industry join fetch c.industry.sector join fetch c.contactDPE left join fetch c.misldRegistration left join fetch c.misldAccountSettings left join fetch c.misldAccountSettings.qualifiedDiscount left join fetch c.misldAccountSettings.licenseAgreementType
where c.accountNumber = :accountNumber

from com.ibm.tap.misld.om.cndb.Customer c
join fetch c.customerType join fetch c.pod join fetch c.misldRegistration join fetch c.misldAccountSettings join fetch c.misldAccountSettings.licenseAgreementType
where c.misldAccountSettings.status = 'COMPLETE'

from com.ibm.tap.misld.om.cndb.Customer c
join fetch c.customerType join fetch c.pod join fetch c.misldRegistration join fetch c.misldAccountSettings join fetch c.misldAccountSettings.licenseAgreementType
where c.misldRegistration.inScope = 1 and (c.misldAccountSettings.status = 'COMPLETE' or c.misldAccountSettings.status = 'LOCKED') and not exists ( from MsHardwareBaseline m where m.customer = c and m.status = 'ACTIVE')
